description: This Dart source file defines a Flutter widget for a product listing screen, including UI components for searching, filtering, and displaying books in a responsive grid. It manages state for category and price filters, integrates with mock data, and handles navigation to product details.

classes.name: ListingScreen
classes.description: Public interface widget representing the book listing screen, initialized with an optional category filter.

classes.name: _ListingScreenState
classes.description: State class managing interactive elements, filters, search query, and UI updates for ListingScreen.

methods.name: initState
methods.description: Initializes state variables, especially setting the initial category from widget parameters.

methods.name: _baseBooks
methods.description: Returns a list of books filtered by current category and price range from mock data.

methods.name: _currentBooks
methods.description: Filters base books further by current search query; returns matching books.

methods.name: openProduct
methods.description: Navigates to the product detail screen for a selected book.

methods.name: _showFilterSheet
methods.description: Displays a modal bottom sheet allowing users to adjust price range and category filters.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree, including header, search bar, filter chips, and a responsive grid of books.

methods.name: _header
methods.description: Builds the header section with title, description, search bar, and category filter chips.
